item.title: When no one subscribed to my list...
item.description: There was a time when I was writing to literally no one. Not a single soul. How much motivation do you think that gives you? I didn’t get bad feedback or hatred. I was just ignored. Everyone says they need motivation to start working and to continue their project. FUCK THAT! I’m on a train writing this after I just got through my 9th lesson in school. I don’t “feel like” writing this.
item.content:encoded:
There was a time when I was writing to literally no one.

Not a single soul.

How much motivation do you think that gives you?

I didn’t get bad feedback or hatred.

I was just ignored.

Everyone says they need motivation to start working and to continue their project.

FUCK THAT!  I’m on a train writing this after I just got through my 9th lesson in school.

I don’t “feel like” writing this.

Yet here I am.

Are you procrastinating?

What’s your problem?

Don’t know where to start? Read a book.

You know what’s the next step? DO IT. 

Good luck.
